house_listing.house_description: This inovative 3-5 bdrm hm, 'the hartford', features open floor plans w/vaulted family rm. Double banked windows, plant shelves & decorating niche's make this plan a stunning new addition to our new home offerings!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Contemporary Style, Foyer, Loft,Recreation Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
